model_code:
S = input().strip()
count0 = 0  # Flips needed to make the string start with '0' and alternate
count1 = 0  # Flips needed to make the string start with '1' and alternate

for i in range(len(S)):
    expected0 = 0 if (i % 2 == 0) else 1
    expected1 = 1 if (i % 2 == 0) else 0
    if S[i] != expected0:
        count0 += 1
    if S[i] != expected1:
        count1 += 1

print(min(count0, count1))
